Progress will discontinue Telerik Platform on May 10th, 2018. Learn more

plugin

Usage Synopsis
List $ appbuilder plugin [--available] [--debug] [--release][--count]
Manage $ appbuilder plugin <Command>

Lists all Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules that are currently enabled for your project and shows information about their variables, if any. With the --available switch, lists all plugins or custom modules that are enabled in your project and that you can enable in your project.

Options

  • --available - Lists all Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules that are currently enabled in your project and all Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules that you can enable in your project. Shows information about the variables of the Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules, if any.
  • --debug - Lists all Apache Cordova plugins enabled for the Debug build configuration. If --available is set, also lists all Apache Cordova plugins that you can enable for the Debug build configuration. This option is applicable only to Apache Cordova projects.
  • --release - Lists all Apache Cordova plugins enabled for the Release build configuration. If --available is set, also lists all Apache Cordova plugins that you can enable for the Release build configuration. This option is applicable only to Apache Cordova projects.
  • --count - Lists the selected number of npm and NativeScript modules. The default value is 10. This option is applicable only to NativeScript projects.

Attributes

<Command> extends the plugin command. You can set the following values for this attribute.

  • add - Enables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules for your project.
  • configure - Configures plugin variables for the selected plugin.
  • remove - Disables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules for your project.
  • find - Searches by keyword for Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules.
  • fetch - Imports the selected Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules into your project.

Related Commands

Command Description
kendoui Lists the available Kendo UI Core or Kendo UI Professional packages that you can add to your project.
kendoui install Updates or adds Kendo UI Code or Kendo UI Professional to your project.
kendoui notes Shows release notes for the available Kendo UI Core and Kendo UI Professional packages.
plugin add Enables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules for your project.
plugin configure Configures Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules variables for selected plugin.
plugin remove Disables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules from your project.
plugin find Searches by one or more keywords for Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules.
plugin fetch Imports the selected Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules into your project.
